definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: :Ez Eze 1:18) anything convex, curved, gibbous, e.g. back, chiefly late;—abs. [[גׇּ֑ב]] Ez Eze 16:24; cstr. [[גַּב]] Ez Eze 43:13 (rd. [[גּׁבַהּ]] LXX Ew Sm Co); sf. [[גַּבִּי]] Ps 129:3, [[גַּבֵךְ]] Ez Eze 16:31, Eze 16:39; pl. cstr. [[גַּבּׂת]] Le 14:9, [[גַּבֵּי]] Job 13:12, Job 15:26; sf. [[גַּבֵּיהֶם]] 1Ki 7:33, [[גַּבֵּהֶם]] Ez Eze 10:12, [[גַּבֵּיהֶן]] Ez Eze 1:18, [[גַּׁבּׂתָם]] Ez Eze 1:18; —
back, of man (fig. of Isr.) Ps 129:3; appar. of cherubim Ez Eze 10:12, but Hi Sm emend v. so that ´[[גּ]] ref. to wheels, rim v.
mound, for illicit worship Ez Eze 16:24, Eze 16:31, Eze 16:39 (all ‖[[רמה]]); LXX Vulgate lupanar, brothel, after analogy of fornix, but this without sufficient proof, & needless.

boss, or convex projection, of shield Job 15:26 (fig.) he runneth against him... with the stout bosses of his shields (i.e. wicked against ´[[י]]); so z.hr in Ar. in similar phrase; cf. also Ar. jawbun, shield; also French bouclier fr. boucle.
bulwarks, breastworks, fig. for arguments [[לְגַבֵּי־חׂמֶר גַּבֵּיכֶם]] Job 13:12 breastworks of clay are your breastworks.
brow, only [[גַּבּׂת עֵינׇיו]] Le 14:9 his eyebrows.
rim of wheel, felloe 1Ki 7:33, Ez Eze 1:18, Eze 1:18; so perh. Eze 10:12 v.
supr.—Ez Eze 43:13; elevation, i.e. basement of altar, Da after MT., but v. [[גּׁבַהּ]], cf. supr.
